si.title: නළු මොහාන්ලාාල් ශ්රී ලංකාවට පැමිණේ
body_lines: ශ්රී ලංකා නළු මොහාලෝල් වෙනුවෙන් ශ්රී ලංකා ගුවන් සේවය පිළිගෙන තිබේ. (අ)

en.title: Actor Mohanlal visits Sri Lanka
body_lines: Sri Lankan Airlines has been welcomed on behalf of Sri Lanka Actor Mohanlal. (A)

summary_lines: Actor Mohanlal visited Sri Lanka. He was welcomed by Sri Lankan Airlines on behalf of the country. This event highlights cultural exchange between India and Sri Lanka through the film industry.
